key.name: connection_id
key.description: The name of a global utility providing configured IBrokerConnection. A consuming server will serve consumers registered for its connection id only.

key.name: site_id
key.description: The id of a site, which should be the context when consuming the AMQP messages, which the consumers of a consuming server consume.

key.name: user_id
key.description: Optional user id of the user, whose privileges are used to consume the messages. By default, the messages are consumed as Anonymous User calling trusted filesystem code.
